service.name: /mren201.mr
service.query: SELECT CNT.CNTR_ID , CNT.STR_CD , CNT.VEN_CD , VEN.VEN_NAME AS VEN_NM , VEN.COMP_NO AS COMP_NO /*사업자 번호*/ , VEN.REP_NAME AS REP_NAME /*대표자*/ , VEN.PHONE1_NO||'-'||VEN.PHONE2_NO||'-'||VEN.PHONE3_NO AS PHONE_NO /*전화번호*/ , CNT.BELONG_STR_CD /*소속시설*/ , CNT.CHAR_NAME /*담당자명*/ , CNT.PHONE1_NO /*담당자연력처1*/ , CNT.PHONE2_NO /*담당자연력처1*/ , CNT.PHONE3_NO /*담당자연력처1*/ , CNT.CNTR_TYPE /*계약유형*/ , CNT.SAP_CNTR_ID /*계약번호*/ , CNT.CNTR_S_DT /*계약기간[시작일]*/ , CNT.CNTR_E_DT /*계약기간[종료일]*/ , CNT.RENT_TYPE /*임대형태*/ , CNT.RENT_FLAG /*임대구분*/ , CNT.CNTR_AREA /*계약면전*/ , CNT.RENT_DEPOSIT /*임대보증금*/ , CNT.PAY_FLAG /*입금상태*/ , CNT.EXCL_AREA /*전용면적*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT /*월임대료(VAT제외)*/ , CNT.SHR_AREA /*공유면적*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE_VAT /*월임대료(VAT금액)*/ , CNT.DONG /*동*/ , CNT.FLOOR_FLAG /*층*/ , CNT.HO /*호*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE /*월임대료(VAT포함)*/ , CNT.FILE_PATH /*첨부파일*/ , CNT.FCL_TYPE /*임대시설종류*/ , CNT.MNTN_CAL_YN /*관리비부과여부*/ , CNT.CHRG_YN /*관리비청구내역관리여부*/ , CNT.ARR_CAL_YN /*관리비연체계산여부*/ , CNT.ARR_RATE /*관리비연체율*/ , CNT.PAY_TERM_TYPE /*관리비납부기한기준*/ , CNT.PAY_TERM_DD /*관리비납부기한일*/ , CNT.OFFICE_PAY_AMT /*오피스평당관리비*/ , CNT.RENT_CAL_YN /*임대료계산여부*/ , CNT.RENT_ARR_CAL_YN /*임대료연체계산여부*/ , CNT.RENT_ARR_RATE /*임대료연체율*/ , CNT.RENT_PAY_TERM_TYPE /*임대료납부기한기준*/ , CNT.RENT_PAY_TERM_DD /*임대료납부기한일*/ , CNT.PWR_KIND_CD /*전기용도*/ , CNT.PWR_TYPE /*전압*/ , CNT.PWR_SEL_CHARGE /*선택요금*/ , CNT.PWR_CNTR_QTY /*계약전력*/ , CNT.PWR_REVER_RATE /*전력역률*/ , CNT.WWTR_KIND_CD /*온수급탕용도*/ , CNT.WWTR_QTY /*온수계약용량면적*/ , CNT.WWTR_CHARGE_YN /*온수차등요금제여부*/ , CNT.STM_KIND_CD /*증기용도*/ , CNT.STM_QTY /*증기열교환기열량*/ , CNT.CWTR_KIND_CD /*냉수용도*/ , CNT.CWTR_QTY /*냉수열교환기열량*/ , CNT.GAS_KIND_CD /*가수용도구분*/ , CNT.GAS_REDU_TYPE /*도시가스경감구분*/ , CNT.WTR_KIND_CD /*수도용도구분*/ , CNT.DIV_RATE /*공용안분율*/ , CNT.TV_CNT /*TV수신량*/ , CNT.WTR_CAL_SIZE /*수도계량기구경*/ , CNT.REMARK /*비고*/ , CNT.FILE_PATH AS OLD_FILE_PATH , '' AS REAL_FILE_PATH , 'N' AS FILE_GB , 'N' AS CHANGED_FLAG , TO_CHAR(CNT.REG_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DATE FROM MSS.MR_CNTRMST CNT , DPS.PC_VENMST VEN WHERE CNT.VEN_CD = VEN.VEN_CD AND CNT.VEN_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND CNT.RENT_TYPE LIKE ?||'%' AND CNT.RENT_FLAG LIKE ?||'%' AND CNT.CNTR_TYPE LIKE ?||'%' AND CNT.STR_CD = ?

SELECT SVE.VEN_CD , SVE.VEN_NAME , VEN.COMP_NO , VEN.REP_NAME , CASE WHEN VEN.PHONE1_NO IS NULL THEN '' ELSE VEN.PHONE1_NO||'-'||VEN.PHONE2_NO||'-'||VEN.PHONE3_NO END AS PHONE_NO , VEN.BIZ_TYPE , SVE.POS_CAL_FLAG , (SELECT COUNT(CNTR_ID) FROM MSS.MR_CNTRMST WHERE VEN_CD = SVE.VEN_CD AND STR_CD = SVE.STR_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN CNTR_S_DT AND CNTR_E_DT) AS USE_COUNT FROM DPS.PC_VENMST VEN , DPS.PC_STRVENMST SVE WHERE VEN.VEN_CD = SVE.VEN_CD AND SVE.VEN_CD = ? AND SVE.STR_CD = ?

UPDATE MSS.MR_CNTRMST SET CNTR_E_DT = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD')-1, 'YYYYMMDD') , CNTR_TYPE = CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD')-1) < SYSDATE THEN '04' ELSE CNTR_TYPE END , CNTR_CAN_DT = CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD')-1) < SYSDATE THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END , CNTR_CAN_REAS_CD = CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD')-1) < SYSDATE THEN '01' ELSE '' END , MOD_ID = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE CNTR_ID = ?

INSERT INTO MSS.MR_CNTRMST ( CNTR_ID , ORG_CNTR_ID , STR_CD , VEN_CD , BELONG_STR_CD , CHAR_NAME , PHONE1_NO , PHONE2_NO , PHONE3_NO , CNTR_TYPE , SAP_CNTR_ID , CNTR_S_DT , CNTR_E_DT , RENT_TYPE , RENT_FLAG , CNTR_AREA , RENT_DEPOSIT , EXCL_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT , SHR_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_VAT , DONG , FLOOR_FLAG , HO , MM_RENTFEE , FILE_PATH , FCL_TYPE , MNTN_CAL_YN , CHRG_YN , ARR_CAL_YN , ARR_RATE , PAY_TERM_TYPE , PAY_TERM_DD , OFFICE_PAY_AMT , RENT_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_RATE , RENT_PAY_TERM_TYPE , RENT_PAY_TERM_DD , PAY_FLAG , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE /* ---미관리--- */ , DANGI , PWR_DC_TYPE , PWR_REDU_TYPE , PAY_YN , CNTR_CAN_DT , CNTR_CAN_REAS_CD , RTRN_AMT , ADD_DED_AMT , ADD_DED_REASON , CNTR_CAN_SLIP_NO /* ---미관리---*/ ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , NVL(?, 0) , NVL(?, 0) , NVL(?, 0) , NVL(?, 0) , NVL(?, 0) , NVL(?, 0) , ? , ? , ? , NVL(?, 0) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , '0' , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , '' /*DANGI*/ , '' /*PWR_DC_TYPE*/ , '' /*PWR_REDU_TYPE*/ , '' /*PAY_YN*/ , '' /*CNTR_CAN_DT*/ , '' /*CNTR_CAN_REAS_CD*/ , 0 /*RTRN_AMT*/ , 0 /*ADD_DED_AMT*/ , '' /*ADD_DED_REASON*/ , '' /*CNTR_CAN_SLIP_NO*/ )

UPDATE MSS.MR_CNTRMST SET STR_CD = ? , VEN_CD = ? , BELONG_STR_CD = ? , CHAR_NAME = ? , PHONE1_NO = ? , PHONE2_NO = ? , PHONE3_NO = ? , CNTR_TYPE = ? , SAP_CNTR_ID = ? , CNTR_S_DT = ? , CNTR_E_DT = ? , RENT_TYPE = ? , RENT_FLAG = ? , CNTR_AREA = ? , RENT_DEPOSIT = ? , EXCL_AREA = ? , MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT = ? , SHR_AREA = ? , MM_RENTFEE_VAT = ? , DONG = ? , FLOOR_FLAG = ? , HO = ? , MM_RENTFEE = ? , FILE_PATH = ? , FCL_TYPE = ? , MNTN_CAL_YN = ? , CHRG_YN = ? , ARR_CAL_YN = ? , ARR_RATE = ? , PAY_TERM_TYPE = ? , PAY_TERM_DD = ? , OFFICE_PAY_AMT = ? , RENT_CAL_YN = ? , RENT_ARR_CAL_YN = ? , RENT_ARR_RATE = ? , RENT_PAY_TERM_TYPE = ? , RENT_PAY_TERM_DD = ? , MOD_ID = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE CNTR_ID = ?

INSERT INTO MSS.MR_CNTRHST ( CNTR_ID , SEQ_NO , STR_CD , VEN_CD , BELONG_STR_CD , CHAR_NAME , PHONE1_NO , PHONE2_NO , PHONE3_NO , CNTR_TYPE , SAP_CNTR_ID , CNTR_S_DT , CNTR_E_DT , RENT_TYPE , RENT_FLAG , CNTR_AREA , RENT_DEPOSIT , EXCL_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT , SHR_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_VAT , DONG , FLOOR_FLAG , HO , MM_RENTFEE , FILE_PATH , FCL_TYPE , MNTN_CAL_YN , ARR_CAL_YN , ARR_RATE , PAY_TERM_TYPE , PAY_TERM_DD , OFFICE_PAY_AMT , RENT_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_RATE , RENT_PAY_TERM_TYPE , RENT_PAY_TERM_DD , DANGI , PWR_DC_TYPE , PWR_REDU_TYPE , CHRG_YN , PAY_YN , CNTR_CAN_DT , CNTR_CAN_REAS_CD , RTRN_AMT , ADD_DED_AMT , ADD_DED_REASON , CNTR_CAN_SLIP_NO , PAY_FLAG , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE) (SELECT CNTR_ID , (SELECT NVL((MAX(SEQ_NO)+1), 1) FROM MSS.MR_CNTRHST WHERE CNTR_ID = ?) AS SEQ_NO , STR_CD , VEN_CD , BELONG_STR_CD , CHAR_NAME , PHONE1_NO , PHONE2_NO , PHONE3_NO , ? AS CNTR_TYPE /*계약유형*/ , SAP_CNTR_ID , CNTR_S_DT , CNTR_E_DT , RENT_TYPE , RENT_FLAG , CNTR_AREA , RENT_DEPOSIT , EXCL_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT , SHR_AREA , MM_RENTFEE_VAT , DONG , FLOOR_FLAG , HO , MM_RENTFEE , FILE_PATH , FCL_TYPE , MNTN_CAL_YN , ARR_CAL_YN , ARR_RATE , PAY_TERM_TYPE , PAY_TERM_DD , OFFICE_PAY_AMT , RENT_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_CAL_YN , RENT_ARR_RATE , RENT_PAY_TERM_TYPE , RENT_PAY_TERM_DD , DANGI , PWR_DC_TYPE , PWR_REDU_TYPE , CHRG_YN , PAY_YN , CNTR_CAN_DT , CNTR_CAN_REAS_CD , RTRN_AMT , ADD_DED_AMT , ADD_DED_REASON , CNTR_CAN_SLIP_NO , '0' AS PAY_FLAG , ? AS REG_ID , SYSDATE AS REG_DATE , ? AS MOD_ID , SYSDATE AS MOD_DATE FROM MSS.MR_CNTRMST WHERE CNTR_ID = ?)

INSERT INTO MSS.MR_DEPOSPAY ( CNTR_ID , PAY_SEQ_NO , PAY_DT , PAY_AMT , PAY_SLIP_NO , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE) (SELECT ? AS CNTR_ID , PAY_SEQ_NO , PAY_DT , PAY_AMT , PAY_SLIP_NO , ? AS REG_ID , SYSDATE AS REG_DATE , ? AS MOD_ID , SYSDATE AS MOD_DATE FROM MSS.MR_DEPOSPAY WHERE CNTR_ID = ?)

SELECT CNT.CNTR_TYPE /*계약유형*/ , CNT.CNTR_S_DT /*계약기간[시작일]*/ , CNT.CNTR_E_DT /*계약기간[종료일]*/ , CNT.CNTR_AREA /*계약면적*/ , CNT.EXCL_AREA , CNT.SHR_AREA , CNT.RENT_DEPOSIT /*임대보증금*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE_NOVAT /*월임대료(VAT제외)*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE_VAT /*월임대료(VAT금액)*/ , CNT.MM_RENTFEE /*월임대료(VAT포함)*/ , CASE WHEN CNT.DONG||'/'||CNT.FLOOR_FLAG||'/'||CNT.HO = '//' THEN '' ELSE CNT.DONG||'/'||CNT.FLOOR_FLAG||'/'||CNT.HO END AS DONGFH /*동/층/호*/ , CASE WHEN CNT.PHONE1_NO||'-'||CNT.PHONE2_NO||'-'||CNT.PHONE3_NO = '--' THEN '' ELSE CNT.PHONE1_NO||'-'||CNT.PHONE2_NO||'-'||CNT.PHONE3_NO END AS PHONE , CNT.CHAR_NAME /*담당자명*/ , CASE WHEN CNT.MNTN_CAL_YN = 'Y' THEN '부과' ELSE '미부과' END MNTN_CAL_YN /*관리비부과여부*/ , CNT.PWR_KIND_CD , CNT.PWR_TYPE , CNT.PWR_SEL_CHARGE , CNT.PWR_CNTR_QTY , CNT.PWR_REVER_RATE , CNT.PWR_REDU_TYPE , CNT.WWTR_KIND_CD , CNT.WWTR_CHARGE_YN , CNT.STM_KIND_CD , CNT.STM_QTY , CNT.CWTR_KIND_CD , CNT.CWTR_QTY , CNT.GAS_KIND_CD , CNT.GAS_REDU_TYPE , CNT.WTR_KIND_CD , CNT.DIV_RATE , CNT.TV_CNT , TO_CHAR(CNT.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:DD') AS MOD_DATE FROM MSS.MR_CNTRHST CNT , DPS.PC_VENMST VEN WHERE CNT.VEN_CD = VEN.VEN_CD AND CNT.CNTR_ID = ? ORDER BY CNT.MOD_DATE DESC, DONGFH ASC
